org.openimaj.experiment.evaluation.classification

Interface ClassificationResult<CLASS>

  • Type Parameters:
    CLASS - type of classes predicted
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicClassificationResult

    public interface ClassificationResult<CLASS>
    The result of a Classifier. The ClassificationResult models one or more assigned classes together with associated confidence values for each class.

    Normally, confidence values are bounded between 0 and 1.

    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getConfidence(CLASS clazz)
      Get the confidence associated with the given class.
      Set<CLASS> getPredictedClasses()
      Get the set of classes predicted by this result.

    • Method Detail

      • getConfidence

        double getConfidence(CLASS clazz)
        Get the confidence associated with the given class. If the class is unknown, then this method should return 0.

        Normally, confidence values are bounded between 0 and 1.

        Parameters:
        clazz - the target class.
        Returns:
        the confidence in assigning the class.

      • getPredictedClasses

        Set<CLASS> getPredictedClasses()
        Get the set of classes predicted by this result. Usually, this is a subset of all classes; specifically those with a high confidence.
        Returns:
        the set of predicted classes.
